macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: S&P 500 Flat, Down 0.14% for Week Ending at 6,940 Amid Choppy Trading
items.summary: The S&P 500 dropped 9.95 points to close Friday at 6,940, a 0.14% decline, after peaking at 6,985 on Monday and bottoming at 6,890 on Wednesday. Markets showed rangebound action with no clear direction.

items.title: Dow Jones Gains Slightly, Up 87 Points to 49,359 for the Week
items.summary: The Dow made a weekly high of 49,587 on Monday and low of 48,879 on Wednesday before closing Friday at 49,359. Trading remained frustrated by lack of significant movement.

items.title: Nasdaq Ends Week Down 145 Points at 25,529 After Rangebound Session
items.summary: Nasdaq hit a high of 25,809 on Monday and low of 25,280 on Wednesday, closing Friday at 25,529. It lagged other indexes in a rotation market favoring small caps.

items.title: December CPI Matches Expectations at 0.3% Monthly, Core at 0.2%; Annual 2.7%
items.summary: U.S. inflation data released Tuesday showed overall CPI up 0.3% in December, matching forecasts, while core CPI rose 0.2% below the expected 0.3%. Annual inflation hit 2.7% as predicted.

items.title: U.S. Stocks Flat as Semiconductor Gains Offset by Weak Banks and Policy News
items.summary: Major U.S. indexes finished the week essentially unchanged, with semiconductor strength counterbalanced by softer bank stocks and ongoing policy headlines.

items.title: Small Caps Lead Market Rotation; IWM Shows Strongest Weekly Structure
items.summary: Russell 2000 (IWM) outperformed with higher highs and internal strength, signaling risk-on rotation into cyclicals, industrials, materials, energy, uranium, defense, and aerospace.

items.title: Wolfe Research Names Nvidia Top AI Pick for 2026; ASML Gets Major Price Target Boost
items.summary: Analysts highlighted Nvidia as the leading AI stock for 2026, with ASML receiving a significant price target increase amid strong AI sector momentum.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Global Crypto Market Cap Dips 0.32% to $3.22T as Bitcoin Trades Sideways
items.summary: The cryptocurrency market cap stands at $3.22T, down 0.32% in the last 24 hours, with Bitcoin trading between $94,876 and $95,639, currently at $95,188 (-0.03%). Major movers include FRAX (+39%), STO (+38%), and RARE (+26%).

items.title: Stanford Professor Unveils New Zero-Knowledge Proof Protocol for Bitcoin
items.summary: A Stanford professor has introduced a new zero-knowledge proof protocol designed specifically for Bitcoin, highlighted as a top story in today's crypto updates.

items.title: Solana Sees Surge in Active Addresses and Transactions Amid Stablecoin Inflows
items.summary: Solana network experiences increased active addresses and transactions, alongside major stablecoin inflows, while Ethereum records net outflows.

items.title: Ethereum Staking Validator Exit Queue Hits Zero, Boosting ETH Confidence
items.summary: Ethereum's staking validator exit queue reaches zero, signaling improved network confidence as ETH trades at $3,322 (+0.80%).

items.title: Bitcoin Options Open Interest Surpasses Futures at $74.1B vs $65.22B
items.summary: Bitcoin options open interest has flipped futures, reaching $74.1 billion compared to $65.22 billion in futures, indicating a new volatility regime.

items.title: Mutuum Finance (MUTM) Records 300% Growth as Phase 7 Presale Accelerates
items.summary: New DeFi project Mutuum Finance sees its token surge over 300% with Phase 7 presale nearing $20M and over 18,700 holders, preparing V1 testnet on Sepolia.

items.title: US Lawmakers Prepare Key Crypto Regulation Hearings and Votes for January 2026
items.summary: US lawmakers are set for key hearings and votes this month to establish clearer rules for cryptocurrency regulation and trading.

items.title: Crypto Legal Named Best Blockchain Law Firm Amid Global Expansion
items.summary: Crypto Legal receives Blockchain Law Firm of the Year 2025 award, expanding to the US and planning Singapore office to handle growing blockchain legal demands.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: NVIDIA Releases Alpamayo Platform for Mercedes-Benz Level 4 Autonomous Driving
items.summary: NVIDIA launched Alpamayo, powering Mercedes-Benz's upcoming CLA vehicle with Level 4 autonomous capabilities. Nemotron Speech ASR processes speech 10x faster, integrated into Bosch in-car systems.

items.title: NVIDIA Unveils Vera Rubin Superchip at CES 2026 with 50 Petaflops Inference
items.summary: At CES 2026, NVIDIA introduced the Vera Rubin superchip, delivering 5x faster inference performance than previous generations. Lenovo announced Qira, a personal AI super-agent across devices, and Boston Dynamics declared Atlas humanoid robot production-ready.

items.title: Falcon-H1R 7B Model Matches Performance of Systems 7x Larger
items.summary: The compact Falcon-H1R model with 7 billion parameters scores 88.1% on advanced math benchmarks, enabling applications in robotics, autonomous vehicles, and edge devices.

items.title: Microsoft Launches Agentic Features in Dynamics 365 for Retail
items.summary: Microsoft is previewing agentic AI features in Dynamics 365 in February 2026, allowing retailers to build autonomous customer experiences amid rising consumer acceptance of AI shopping assistants.

items.title: Anthropic's Claude Emerges as Leader in Agentic AI Revolution
items.summary: Claude by Anthropic is gaining momentum beyond chatbots, recognized as a key player in the agentic revolution with seamless integration for tasks like email drafting and strategy brainstorming.

items.title: New Research on AI and Precision Medicine Published in Scientific Reports
items.summary: A new article explores AI's role in precision medicine, addressing challenges in data integration from genomics, wearables, and health records for personalized digital profiles.

items.title: McKinsey Scales to 20,000 AI Agents and Tests Candidates on AI Skills
items.summary: McKinsey increased AI agents from 3,000 to 20,000 in 18 months and now evaluates job candidates on AI collaboration. 94% of business leaders see AI as top cybersecurity driver in 2026.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: GTA 6 Trailer 3 Rumored to Have Leaked Online Amid November 2026 Release Confirmation
items.summary: Rockstar Games confirmed GTA 6's release for November 2026 after a delay from mid-2026, with speculation about Trailer 3 leaking online and potentially dropping around Take-Two earnings calls or The Game Awards 2025. Fans anticipate more gameplay and story details to build hype.

items.title: Eldegarde Mini-MMO Action RPG Set for Release This Week on January 19, 2026
items.summary: Eldegarde, a new mini-MMO Action RPG featuring PvE, PvPvE, and Arena modes, launches this week, allowing players to explore vast zones, craft gear, and fight in a fantasy world.

items.title: GPC Video Charts Highlight Star Wars Battle Pod Force Awakens Update as Top Game
items.summary: The latest GPC Video Chart Show crowns the Star Wars Battle Pod Force Awakens update as number one, with Go With the Flow on Spectrum Next at number two and an upcoming demo generating excitement.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.
